_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_INP_textField
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: ri!align
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    masked: ri!masked,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(
        {
          ri!validations,
          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }
      )
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    align: ri!align,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    refreshAfter: ri!refreshAfter,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: ri!showCharacterCount,
    inputPurpose: ri!inputPurpose
  )
)

_a-0000eb4d-def5-8000-9d18-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CPS_richTextWithShowMoreLess
_a-0000eb4d-def5-8000-9d18-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!shortenIfLongerThanLen: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
    default: ri!shortenToLen
  ),
  local!showLess: true,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    label: a!defaultValue(ri!label, null),
    labelPosition: a!defaultValue(ri!labelPosition, "COLLAPSED"),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpToolTip,
    value: a!match(
      value: ri!text,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
        ri!showHyphen = true
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "-", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: or(
        a!isNullorEmpty(ri!shortenToLen),
        ri!shortenToLen = 0
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: fv!value, color: "STANDARD"),
      default: if(
        len(ri!text) <= local!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: ri!text,
          color: "STANDARD",
          size: ri!textSize
        ),
        if(
          local!showLess = true,
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: trim(
                rule!AS_CO_UT_left(text: ri!text, numChars: ri!shortenToLen)
              ) & "... ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "More",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show More",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, false)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          },
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: ri!text & " ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "Less",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show Less",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, true)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          }
        )
      )
    ),
    preventWrapping: ri!preventWrapping,
    tooltip: ri!tooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    align: ri!align,
    marginAbove: ri!marginAbove,
    marginBelow: a!defaultValue(ri!marginBelow, "NONE"),
  )
)

_a-0000ecac-819c-8000-9db6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluatorTeam
_a-0000ecac-819c-8000-9db6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters.value,
          ri!logicalExpression
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = false)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray({ ri!fields }),
  
)

_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: {
          ri!fields,
          ri!relatedRecordData.relationship
        },
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set. 

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

_a-0000eb69-8eb8-8000-9d24-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_isBlank
_a-0000eb69-8eb8-8000-9d24-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios, 

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull, 
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_separateListItemsInSentence
_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
with(
  local!list: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(array: ri!list),
  if(
    count(local!list) <= 1,
    concat(local!list),
    if(
      count(local!list) = 2,
      concat(
        local!list[1],
        " ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[2]
      ),
      concat(
        joinarray(
          remove(local!list, count(local!list)),
          ", "
        ),
        ", ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[count(local!list)]
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_evaluationLandingPage
_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!loggedInUser: loggedInUser(),
  local!triggerRefresh: a!refreshVariable(
    value: now(),
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION"
  ),
  local!pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
    startIndex: 1,
    batchSize: cons!AS_GSS_BATCH_SIZE_FOR_EVALUATIONS_IN_HOME_PAGE
  ),
  local!i18nData: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!isEvaluator: rule!AS_GSS_BL_determineIfUserIsEvaluator(loggedInUser: local!loggedInUser),
  local!evaluations: rule!AS_GSS_BL_returnEvaluationInfoForLandingPage(
    loggedInUser: local!loggedInUser,
    executeWhen: true(),
    pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
    triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
  ),
  local!selectedTasks: a!refreshVariable(
    value: null,
    refreshOnVarChange: { local!triggerRefresh }
  ),
  local!canUserCreateEvalaution: rule!AS_GSS_BL_getVisibilityToCreateEvaluation(user: local!loggedInUser),
  local!isHomePage: true(),
  rule!AS_GSS_HCL_evaluationsLandingPage(
    header: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_landingPageHeader(
      i18nData: local!i18nData,
      showCreateEvaluationAction: and(
        local!canUserCreateEvalaution,
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(value: local!evaluations.data)
      )
    ),
    contents: {
      /*My Active Evaluations*/
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_activeEvaluations(
        evaluations: local!evaluations,
        isEvaluator: local!isEvaluator,
        pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        loggedInUser: local!loggedInUser,
        triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh,
        showCreateEvaluationAction: local!canUserCreateEvalaution
      ),
      /*My Tasks*/
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_activeTasks(
        selectedTasks: local!selectedTasks,
        user: local!loggedInUser,
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        isEvaluator: local!isEvaluator,
        isHomePage: local!isHomePage,
        showWhen: true(),
        triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
      )
    }
  )
)

_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_checkIfTotalWeightEqualsUpperLimit
_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
Note: 
If total parent factor weight reaches anywhere between 
99.95 and 100, we round off the total parent factor weight 
to 100.

If total subfactor weight reaches anywhere between (x-1).95 and x,
where "X" is the parent factor weight, we round off the total 
subfactor weight to x. 
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!upperLimit: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!parentFactorWeight,
    default: cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS
  ),
  and(
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) >= 0,
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) <= 0.05
  )
)

_a-0000ecda-a664-8000-9dc8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_returnFieldByFieldIdentifier
_a-0000ecda-a664-8000-9dc8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  a!isNullOrEmpty(value: ri!fieldIdentifier),
  {},
  a!match(
    value: ri!fieldIdentifier,
    equals: "evaluationDates",
    then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideLayout"(
      items: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
          item: rule!AS_CO_INP_dateField(
            label: ri!fieldProperties.startDate.label,
            readOnly: ri!fieldProperties.startDate.readOnly,
            value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStartDate],
            saveInto: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStartDate],
            required: ri!fieldProperties.startDate.required,
            disabled: a!defaultValue(ri!isDisabled, false)
          ),
          width: "MINIMIZE"
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
          item: rule!AS_CO_INP_dateField(
            label: ri!fieldProperties.dueDate.label,
            readOnly: ri!fieldProperties.dueDate.readOnly,
            value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDueDate],
            validations: ri!fieldProperties.dueDate.validations,
            saveInto: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDueDate],
            required: ri!fieldProperties.dueDate.required,
            disabled: a!defaultValue(ri!isDisabled, false)
          ),
          width: "MINIMIZE"
        )
      }
    ),
    equals: "evaluationMethod",
    then: rule!AS_CO_CP_radioButtonField(
      label: ri!fieldProperties.evaluationMethod.label,
      readOnly: ri!fieldProperties.evaluationMethod.readOnly,
      choiceLabels: ri!fieldProperties.evaluationMethod.choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!fieldProperties.evaluationMethod.choiceValues,
      value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationMethodId],
      saveInto: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationMethodId],
      labelPosition: "ABOVE",
      choiceLayout: "STACKED",
      helpTooltip: ri!fieldProperties.evaluationMethod.helpTooltip,
      disabled: a!defaultValue(ri!isDisabled, false)
    ),
    equals: "weightedFactors",
    then: rule!AS_GSS_CO_CP_radioButtonField(
      label: ri!fieldProperties.weightedFactors.label,
      choiceLabels: ri!fieldProperties.weightedFactors.choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!fieldProperties.weightedFactors.choiceValues,
      value: a!defaultValue(
        value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isWeightedFactorsRequired],
        default: true
      ),
      saveInto: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isWeightedFactorsRequired],
      choiceLayout: "STACKED",
      helpTooltip: ri!fieldProperties.weightedFactors.helpTooltip,
      choiceStyle: "STANDARD",
      disabled: a!defaultValue(ri!isDisabled, false)
    ),
    equals: "consensusReportSignature",
    then: rule!AS_GSS_CO_CP_radioButtonField(
      label: ri!fieldProperties.consensusReportSignature.label,
      choiceLabels: ri!fieldProperties.consensusReportSignature.choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!fieldProperties.consensusReportSignature.choiceValues,
      value: a!defaultValue(
        value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isSignaturesRequired],
        default: true
      ),
      saveInto: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isSignaturesRequired],
      choiceLayout: "STACKED",
      helpTooltip: ri!fieldProperties.consensusReportSignature.helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!fieldProperties.consensusReportSignature.showWhen,
      choiceStyle: "STANDARD",
      disabled: a!defaultValue(ri!isDisabled, false)
    ),
    equals: "onSpotConsensus",
    then: rule!AS_CO_CP_radioButtonField(
      label: ri!fieldProperties.onSpotConsensus.label,
      readOnly: ri!fieldProperties.onSpotConsensus.readOnly,
      choiceLabels: ri!fieldProperties.onSpotConsensus.choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!fieldProperties.onSpotConsensus.choiceValues,
      value: a!defaultValue(
        value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isOnSpotConsensus],
        default: false()
      ),
      saveInto: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isOnSpotConsensus],
      labelPosition: "ABOVE",
      choiceLayout: "STACKED",
      disabled: a!defaultValue(ri!isDisabled, false),
      helpTooltip: ri!fieldProperties.onSpotConsensus.helpTooltip
    ),
    equals: "popDates",
    then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
      label: ri!fieldProperties.popDates.label,
      value: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDate(
            date: ri!solicitationDetails.popStartDate
          ),
          showWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
            value: ri!solicitationDetails.popEndDate
          )
        ),
        " - ",
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDate(date: ri!solicitationDetails.popEndDate),
          showWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
            value: ri!solicitationDetails.popStartDate
          )
        )
      },
      showWhen: ri!fieldProperties.popDates.showWhen
    ),
    default: {}
  )
)

_a-0000ecda-a664-8000-9dc8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_handleEvaluationDataOnSubmit
_a-0000ecda-a664-8000-9dc8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(value: ri!evaluation),
  {},
  a!flatten(
    rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
      createdByField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
      createdOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
      modifiedByField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
      modifiedOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
      isActiveField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy,
      recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD,
      data: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
        records: ri!evaluation,
        modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD(
          recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.criteria: rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
            createdByField: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
            createdOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
            modifiedByField: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
            modifiedOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
            isActiveField: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
            modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy,
            recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD,
            data: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.criteria],
              expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
                records: fv!item,
                modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD(
                  recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.SubCriteria: rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
                    createdByField: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
                    createdOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
                    modifiedByField: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
                    modifiedOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
                    isActiveField: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
                    modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy,
                    recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD,
                    data: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.SubCriteria]
                  )
                )
              )
            )
          ),
          recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDocuments: rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
            createdByField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
            createdOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
            modifiedByField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
            modifiedOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
            isDeletedField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted,
            modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy,
            recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD,
            data: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDocuments],
              expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
                records: fv!item,
                modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD(
                  recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.documentName: document(
                    fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.appianDocId],
                    "name"
                  ),
                  recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.fileType: document(
                    fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.appianDocId],
                    "extension"
                  )
                )
              )
            )
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

          recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluation:fv!item
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
)

  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Evaluation',

  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationNumber)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationNumber",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "in",
      value: {
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE
      }
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  sort: ri!sort
)
